name: lestrrat (@lestrrat@mastodon.social)
summary:
Just experience a test of what @bagder has been talking about CVEs

My JWT/JWx library was reported for HTTP/2 rapid reset vuln. It's from a dep in golang.org/x/net, and the reporter said Snyk has flagged it

But my lib can only be used as a model/parser for JWx, and never as a HTTP/2 server (and Go doesn't let deps of deps transitively affect other parts of the app)

I fully thank the reporter for taking the time to report, but these tools need one more checks before flagging software for vulns
